alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:23PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A broken line of strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Juab and southwestern Tooele Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 422 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of broken strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, or 34 miles west of Dugway English Village, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Utah Test and Training Range South, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, Knolls, Clive, Fish Springs Wildlife Refuge and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 15 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Western Millard and Juab Counties
